## Source: amazon-inspector (f3254d2b582a5e3da6587b8994dab665d74a70e88b0383d6dd0d5f96d82e7a33)
The package digital-checkout was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0132aad35565a08f6756ad37434ae28ea97096ca234ac6ff4ef5a9e621a5f232)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'digital-checkout' @ 99.9.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
